b'Since 2010, the ACA has provided more than 40 million Americans access to health care, expanded Medicaid to 40 states to cover millions of low-income adults under 65, and protected more than 100 million people with preexisting conditions from losing their health insurance.'

b'Thirteen years ago today, I signed the Affordable Care Act into law.

The night the ACA passed was incredibly meaningful, because we knew the law would have a profound impact on the lives of millions of people. 

And it has.'
